Body:
Word-initial PIE *sr- > L. fr-

L. frigus, cf. G. ῥῖγος

Word-medial PIE *-sr- > L. -br-

L. funebris, cf. L. funus, funeris

The intermediate stage was PIE *sr > PIt. *θr.

(Baldi 1999: 284; Leummann 1977, §194, §207; Sihler 1995, §225.2: Weiss 2009/2011: 163)
